title: rust-openssl fails to build on nightly, armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf

labels.name: O-Arm
labels.description: Target: 32-bit Arm processors (armv6, armv7, thumb...), including 64-bit Arm in AArch32 state

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

body:
Build goes smoothly on stable.

Nightly:

```
   Compiling unicode-xid v0.1.0
   Compiling unicode-xid v0.0.4
   Compiling quote v0.3.15
   Compiling lazy_static v0.2.9
   Compiling libc v0.2.32
   Compiling openssl v0.9.20 (file://(...)/rust-openssl/openssl)
   Compiling bitflags v0.9.1
   Compiling itoa v0.3.4
   Compiling cc v1.0.2
error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1

  = note: (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build1.rust-cgu.o: In function `core::slice::{{impl}}::index<u8>':
          /checkout/src/libcore/slice/mod.rs:826: undefined reference to `core::panicking::panic_bounds_check'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build11.rust-cgu.o: In function `alloc::string::{{impl}}::fmt':
          /checkout/src/liballoc/string.rs:1767: undefined reference to `<str as core::fmt::Display>::fmt'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build13.rust-cgu.o: In function `build_script_build::main':
          (...)/rust-openssl/openssl/build.rs:6: undefined reference to `std::io::stdio::_print'
          (...)/rust-openssl/openssl/build.rs:7: undefined reference to `std::io::stdio::_print'
          (...)/rust-openssl/openssl/build.rs:10: undefined reference to `std::io::stdio::_print'
          (...)/rust-openssl/openssl/build.rs:11: undefined reference to `std::io::stdio::_print'
          (...)/rust-openssl/openssl/build.rs:14: undefined reference to `std::io::stdio::_print'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build13.rust-cgu.o:rust-openssl/openssl/build.rs:20: more undefined references to `std::io::stdio::_print' follow
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build13.rust-cgu.o: In function `main':
          build_script_build13-904b92b4b171c025c15ffbab2d8eac8c-exe.rs:(.text.main+0x3c): undefined reference to `std::rt::lang_start'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build15.rust-cgu.o: In function `core::fmt::{{impl}}::fmt<str>':
          /checkout/src/libcore/fmt/mod.rs:1486: undefined reference to `<str as core::fmt::Display>::fmt'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build2.rust-cgu.o: In function `core::str::pattern::{{impl}}::next<core::str::pattern::RejectAndMatch>':
          /checkout/src/libcore/str/pattern.rs:986: undefined reference to `core::panicking::panic_bounds_check'
          /checkout/src/libcore/str/pattern.rs:998: undefined reference to `core::panicking::panic_bounds_check'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build2.rust-cgu.o: In function `core::str::pattern::{{impl}}::next<core::str::pattern::MatchOnly>':
          /checkout/src/libcore/str/pattern.rs:986: undefined reference to `core::panicking::panic_bounds_check'
          /checkout/src/libcore/str/pattern.rs:998: undefined reference to `core::panicking::panic_bounds_check'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build8.rust-cgu.o: In function `std::panicking::begin_panic<&str>':
          /checkout/src/libstd/panicking.rs:538: undefined reference to `std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook'
          (...)/rust-openssl/target/debug/build/openssl-c4a25c64c481d5a4/build_script_build-c4a25c64c481d5a4.build_script_build8.rust-cgu.o: In function `core::ops::arith::{{impl}}::sub':
          /checkout/src/libcore/ops/arith.rs:192: undefined reference to `core::panicking::panic'
          collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:

```
rustc 1.22.0-nightly (4c053db23 2017-10-22)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 4c053db233d69519b548e5b8ed7192d0783e582a
commit-date: 2017-10-22
host: armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf
release: 1.22.0-nightly
LLVM version: 4.0
```
